title: Going Into World Series, Giants And Royals Play Winning Baseball
teaser: Game One of the World Series is Tuesday night between the Kansas City Royals and the San Francisco Giants. The Giants are playing in their third World Series in the last five years, and it's the first for the Royals since 1985. Steve Inskeep gets a preview from NPR's Tom Goldman.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
